titleStmt.title: The vnrighteovs Mammon exchanged for the true riches or A sermon, preached at the funeral of William Adams Esq; in the parish church of St. Lawrence Iury on Tuesday. Septemb. 3. 1661. By Thomas Horton. D.D.
titleStmt.author: Horton, Thomas, d. 1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by I.R. for John CLark, and are to be sold at the entrance into Mercers Chappel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
